tool_description: Loads and processes road network topology data including intersections, road segments, lanes, and connectivity information within specified geographic boundaries.

north_bound.description: Northern latitude boundary in decimal degrees

south_bound.description: Southern latitude boundary in decimal degrees

east_bound.description: Eastern longitude boundary in decimal degrees

west_bound.description: Western longitude boundary in decimal degrees

road_types.description: Types of roads to include: highway, arterial, collector, local

error_messages: Invalid geographic bounds: Ensure north_bound > south_bound and east_bound > west_bound, all within valid latitude/longitude ranges
Area too large: Geographic area exceeds maximum allowed size for processing
Unsupported road type: road_types must contain only [highway, arterial, collector, local]
No network data: No road network data available for the specified geographic area
usage: Provide geographic boundaries using north_bound, south_bound, east_bound, west_bound coordinates, and optionally specify road_types to filter the network data.

network_id.description: Unique identifier for the loaded network dataset

node_ids.description: Array of intersection and endpoint node identifiers

edge_ids.description: Array of road segment edge identifiers connecting nodes

total_length_km.description: Total length of loaded road network in kilometers
